DOC.brief_summary: To monitor the safety of Metalyse速 in clinical practice in patients with acute myocardial infarction over a period of 6 years as required by Korean authorities, with the following observations: 1. Unexpected adverse drug reactions 2. Frequency and nature of adverse events (AEs) 3. Factors on the safety and efficacy profile of the Metalyse速 Injection. Efficacy of Metalyse速 was also assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance to Monitor the Safety and Efficacy of Metalyse速 in Korean Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction
